name: Five Nights At Frosts
description:
The main aim is to get to 6 AM while working as a nightguard.

You have to avoid Carl, Cindy, Casey, Bill, and Frosty.

Carl is fast, He will start at CAM 1 and go to CAM 6, and shut the door when you see him at the door.

Cindy is slow, She will start at CAM 1 and go to CAM 5, shut the door when you see her at the door.

Bill our first robot, he appears in night 3 and will come from CAM 8 to CAM 4 into the middle door.

Frosty our main machine, He appears in Night 5 and will stay in the middle door for the whole night which means keep it shut

Casey our chef, will appear in Night 2 and will go to middle door just close it when you see him
